title: (0xc0000005). Help
body:
A few days ago mid game my computer forced restarted for a windows update, this did not really bother me until I went and tried to open League again. "The application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000005). Click OK to close the application.v  popped up and it wont even let me get to the login screen I tried to uninstalling and reinstalling. When that did not work I tried using the Hextech repair tool ( this included trying a clean uninstall) Still nothing worked. Is there anything else I should try or am I S.O.L?
If it matters I am using the most recent version of McAfee Total protection. 
Thank you in advance for any suggestions/Solutions.
-Oakey

replies.body:
It almost sounds like something might be blocking League from launching correctly if a repair or reinstall aren't seeming to do the trick. This could be coming from a few different sources most likely, so be sure to go over each step in [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues).

If those steps aren't getting you very far, feel free to hit me back up and we can take a closer look for ya!
Thank you for the suggestion, Unfortunately none of the guides solutions seemed to work. Is there anything else you might be able to recommend that I try?

Hmmmmmm the main issue is probably hiding a lot deeper than I'll be able to see here on the boards. Let's get you some one on one attention with our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to dig around and isolate this for you in that ticket!
